description: From Latin omnium (literally “of all”), genitive plural of omnis (“all, every”).

entries.meaning: (cycling) A multiple race event in track cycling. Historically the omnium has had a variety of formats. Currently it consists of the following six events: flying lap, points race, elimination, individual pursuit, scratch race, and time trial.
(finance) The aggregate value of the different stocks in which a loan to government is usually funded.
